title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-3.12 - Swimming pools and bathing beaches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-3.12 - Swimming pools and bathing beaches

State Regulations
A swimming pool or bathing beach operated as a part of a campground for the use of occupants, guests, invitees or employees shall be constructed, maintained and operated so as to comply with the provisions of Subpart 6-1 or 6-2 of this Title as appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-3.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
